name: mega-aide
description: Things learned and things to remember for my Megacade

scripts.save: npm run patch:versions && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run clear:gh-pages && npm run build:gh-pages
scripts.clear:gh-pages: cd ../gh-pages && rm runtime.* && rm polyfills.* && rm styles.* && rm main.*
scripts.build:gh-pages: cp -R ./app/webapp/dist/webapp/. ../gh-pages && npm run gh-pages:adjust && npm run dist:404
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run save && npm run deploy:gh-pages
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: npm run build:gh-pages && cd ../gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push
scripts.patch:versions: npm run patch:version && npm run patch:webapp:version
